about.mainDescription: Eshtarena is the group shopping and purchasing management application for individuals and businesses by offering group purchasing deals on various products from different suppliers to provide the best price ever and the biggest discounts on purchase vouchers.
about.priceDescription: Eshtarena ultimately offers you the best price for the product with the discount of bulk quantities throughout the group offer period üòä
about.discountDescription: Eshtarena also offers you additional upfront discounts through group purchasing offers for vouchers from different suppliers without any irrational terms üòä
about.downloadTitle: Download the application now and start your saving journey

deals.title: Deals Types
deals.description: Discover our variety of deals types that designed to save your money and provide the best value for your purchases

originalDeal.title: What is original deal?
originalDeal.description: They are pre-prepared group purchase offers from Eshtarena that specify the price, quantity and supplier for a specific product after receiving price offers from all verified suppliers for this product and choosing the best offer to be presented to you
originalDeal.point1: The offer ends when the specified quantity or deal time ends
originalDeal.point2: You can buy any quantity you want and get the group offer price automatically at the time of purchase
originalDeal.point3: Eshtarena guarantees you the best price for the product in the market throughout the offer
originalDeal.point4: You can view the supplier profile page, view the return policies and after-sales services

coldDeal.title: What is Cold deal?
coldDeal.description: These deals are for specific products that require more time to allow suppliers to compete in an open tender throughout the offer period to offer us the best price.
coldDeal.refundPolicy: Buy the quantity you want at the current offer price before the end of the deal period from the mentioned supplier and in case there is a better offer from another supplier, eshtarena will automatically refund the price difference to your bank card used in the purchase.

howToUse.title: How can you use the purchase vouchers?
howToUse.point1: After purchasing a voucher for a specific brand from the group purchase offer, the voucher is automatically added to your vouchers' wallet on eshtarena.
howToUse.point2: You can open the voucher from your wallet, view your balance and bill the branch or the supplier's website and mobile app with the voucher barcode number.
howToUse.point3: You can cash out the full or partial value of the voucher and spend the remaining balance in future purchases.
howToUse.point4: You will receive a notification from eshtarena after each purchase on what was spent with the remaining balance in this voucher.

voucherDeal.title: What is Voucher deal?
voucherDeal.description: They are pre-prepared group purchase offers from Eshtarena with a specific price, quantity and supplier on a discounted purchase voucher without terms or conditions from various suppliers.
voucherDeal.point1: Buy a purchase voucher from the supplier you choose in the group offer at a discounted price and enjoy spending the full voucher value at the supplier without terms or conditions.
voucherDeal.point2: Save before you buy from the brands you love and pay from your voucher wallet on eshtarena at the supplier's branches or website or mobile app.
